Production Co: Rock Films, Man's Films Productions, Orka
Synopsis: 15-year-old Leshka lives in a secluded village on the Bering Strait. Like most men where he lives, he is a whale hunter. When internet arrives in the village, Leshka becomes infatuated with a webcam model from America -- so far away and yet almost close enough to see across the waters of the Strait. Coming of age in the male-dominated whaling community, Leshka's encounter with this mysterious woman awakens in him a desire to find love outside of the confines of his tiny world.
Title: The Whaler Boy
